testimonials.text: Here is a write-up of some nice things that some people have said about me. The only truth that they have had to say about me

Igune Justine Robert must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!

Igune Justine Robert, my husband must be one of the most committed Software developers I've ever seen! He is always at peace once he finds a solution and a working product if on live somewhere in the clouds. Hey you, you should consult this guy for anything related to Software Engineering, he has massive job experience and I am confident that he can fit well in any area and with any people of different backgrounds and he also has lead in an International settings for example, he was once a Zone leader since 2010 -2017 in Kampala International Church!

That Igune Justine Robert must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!

Igune Justine Robert is a highly motivated, self-driven, and knowledgeable person. He is a reliable and experienced Full Stack software engineer who has mastered the development programming languages.He has experience in IT especially in Software engineering trainings and strong organizational and administrative skills with the ability to work independently and use his own initiative. He possesses a passion for refugees, sustainabledevelopment, and peaceful co-existence between people. Igune Justine Robert is also a strong Africanist. He is also inspired by ideas that bring about everlasting solutions to community challenges.
testimonials.user: Destin Ndebo Rugereza... Administrator at Inuka Academy & OYOH

testimonials.text: Igune Justine Robert is one of the most brilliant open minder developers I've ever met! He loves to contribute and share his knowledge in any possible with whoever he finds in need of it. He is also open to learning from everyone and anyone who's ing to share with him, he may be one of my favourite experienced Software Engineer and I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in your team!
testimonials.user: Steve Waziongo... Full Stack Software Engineer
